title: (x) Tipp-ex Logo font / bold italic grotesque - probably custom
content:
Hi Guys, I was wondering if somebody could help me out with this one, I am looking for a font that resembles closely the Tipp-ex logo? Any input would be very much appreciated, thanks.

author: bruiestru

comments.content:
Stretched Helvetica Black with custom p I'd say.  
Andreas
